nodes.text: Temple Quartermaster was a title used by the Jedi Order given to a member of the Order stationed at the Coruscant Jedi Temple. The quartermaster was responsible for the dissemination and maintenance of all field equipment used by Jedi active on missions for the Order.

Equipment commonly carried by Jedi in the field usually consisted of their personal lightsaber, survival rations in the form of capsules, a Hush-98 comlink, a fibercord grappling hook and/or a grappling spike launcher, a holoprojector (such as an Imagecaster), a holomap, an A99 aquata breather, and other specialized equipment.
